    Where your passion becomes your profession

      The latest

      Online Spanish & English courses

      Master key languages such as English or Spanish. Practice at your own pace and enhance your skills. Join now!

      Explore our Communication Degrees

      Boost your career in the international world of communication and marketing. Get the experiential training you need and get ready to succeed.

      Enhance your legal career

      Specialise your career with our legal experts. Quality, flexibility and 24/7 access from anywhere.

      Building the future of higher education: go beyond

      Universidad Europea: your campus-based and online university in Spain

      91%

      Employability

      We educate and create excellent professionals: 91% of alumni are employed within 18 months

      110.000

      Alumni

      Our large community of students is divided between Madrid, Valencia, the Canary Islands and online programmes.

      Top 5

      in Spain

      We are in the "Top 5" best private universities in Spain according to El Mundo.

      The opinion of our students

      Universidad Europea has managed, together with its faculty, to adapt, increasing flexibility, rebounding once again in technology in the classrooms (100% digitised classrooms) and showing that adversities are opportunities to grow!

      Carolina Merina

      Medicine Student

      Grado en Medicina

      The University has given me the tools I need to adapt to a constantly changing world.

      Marcelo Esteban

      Alumni

      Máster Universitario en Comunicación y Emprendimiento Digital

      The University is a place where a thousand roads open and you choose which one you want to take.

      Emma Lope

      Alumni

      Doble Grado en Ingeniería Aeroespacial + DiCre

      The latest news

      Universidad Europea among the 50 best universities in the world in Sports Sciences

      El prestigioso Ranking de Shanghái reconoce a la Universidad Europea como la mejor universidad privada española en Ciencias del Deporte

      18 dec 2023

      Empathy and solidarity to welcome Christmas

      Books with chocolate, a video game market and a food collection campaign are some of the activities with which the Universidad Europea has helped various charities

      14 dec 2023

      Universidad Europea holds the Second Meeting on Diversity and Volunteering

      The advice and experiences of the expert in inspiration and personal development, Víctor Küppers, as well as the overcoming stories of Mireia Cabañes and David Aguilar "Hand Solo", have been the protagonists of this day in which more than 150 students have signed up to the community of Volunteers of Universidad Europea

      04 dec 2023
